document_data.name: Escobert
document_data.mainbody: '''Escobert the Red''' was a [[shield dwarf]] and the castellan of keep of the small town of [[Greenest]], located in the [[Western Heartlands]] in [[west Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Personality: As master of the keep, Escobert knew all about the city's defenses and tunnels and the sally port under it.
document_data.Description: Escobert was a dwarf with messy and unkempt red hair.
document_data.History: In the 1480s [[DR]],{{ToD-time}} during the battle with the [[Dragon aging|adult]] [[blue dragon]]  [[Lennithon]] and the [[Cult of the Dragon]], Escobert remained in command in the keep with the wounded governor [[Tarbaw Nighthill]].
